message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking of offering $120 for it. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $120. I appreciate your interest in the product! After considering it, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $175. It's a bit higher than your offer, but I think it's still a great value. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $175 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $150 for the product. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is still a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $160. It's the highest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $145 for the product. Can you consider that?
